source.name: Telephone Subscribership in the United States
source.description: This report presents comprehensive data on telephone penetration statistics collected by the Bureau of the Census under contract with the FCC. Along with telephone penetration statistics for the United States and each of the states from November 1983 to November 2009, data are provided on penetration based on various demographic characteristics.
